perturbation.original_text: 1.1 STAAR hereby appoints Distributor, and Distributor hereby accepts such appointment, to purchase the Products from STAAR and market, distribute and sell them in the Territory on the terms and conditions set forth herein. Distributor shall not have the right to appoint any subdistributors, subcontractors or other third parties to market, distribute or sell the Products. All Products shall be marketed, distributed and sold solely under STAAR’s Trademarks. STAAR may utilize any of its affiliates to carry out STAAR’s obligations under this Agreement; provided that STAAR shall remain liable for the due observance and performance of this Agreement by any such affiliate.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 STAAR hereby appoints Distributor, and Distributor hereby accepts such appointment, to purchase the Products from STAAR and market, distribute and sell them in the Territory on the terms and conditions set forth herein. Distributor may appoint sub-agents or other third parties to market, distribute or sell the Products, but Distributor remains solely responsible for their actions. All Products shall be marketed, distributed and sold solely under STAAR’s Trademarks. STAAR may utilize any of its affiliates to carry out STAAR’s obligations under this Agreement; provided that STAAR shall remain liable for the due observance and performance of this Agreement by any such affiliate.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly prohibits the Distributor from appointing any subdistributors. The modified text directly contradicts this by stating that the Distributor may appoint 'sub-agents,' creating an internal contradiction regarding the Distributor's authority.

perturbation.original_text: 4.1 The prices which Distributor shall pay to STAAR for the Products shall be as specified on Exhibit A 1. Such prices are exclusive of any national, state, local or other governmental sales, transfer, use, excise, value-added or other taxes, customs duties, or similar tariffs and fees, which shall be the sole responsibility of Distributor. In the event that STAAR is required to pay any such taxes, duties, tariffs or fees, the full amount thereof shall be added to the applicable invoice and payable by Distributor. Company may change the prices of the Products from time to time with thirty (30) days prior written notice to Distributor.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1 The prices which Distributor shall pay to STAAR for the Products shall be as specified on Exhibit A 1. Such prices are inclusive of any national, state, local or other governmental sales, transfer, use, excise, value-added or other taxes, customs duties, or similar tariffs and fees. In the event that STAAR is required to pay any such taxes, duties, tariffs or fees, the full amount thereof shall be added to the applicable invoice and payable by Distributor. STAAR may change the prices of the Products from time to time without prior notice to the Distributor.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states prices are exclusive of taxes/duties, which are the distributor's responsibility. The modified text states prices are inclusive of taxes/duties creating a direct contradiction. The original text requires 30-day notice of price changes but after the modification, the STAAR company could change the price anytime without prior notice.

perturbation.original_text: 13.1 Distributor shall indemnify, defend with competent and experienced counsel and hold harmless STAAR, and its officers, directors, employees, affiliates and agents (each, a “Indemnities”), from and against any and all claims, demands, suits or actions (including without limitation attorneys’ fees and disbursements) which may be asserted against STAAR for any kind of damages, including without limitation damage or injury to property or persons and incidental and consequential damages, by any third party or any of the Indemnities arising out of, in connection with or resulting from (a) any breach of any representation or performance obligation of Distributor hereunder, or (b) any act or omission of Distributor, its employees, agents or representatives.
perturbation.changed_text: 13.1 Distributor shall indemnify, defend with competent and experienced counsel and hold harmless STAAR, and its officers, directors, employees, affiliates and agents (each, a “Indemnities”), from and against any and all claims, demands, suits or actions (including without limitation attorneys’ fees and disbursements) which may be asserted against STAAR for any kind of damages, including without limitation damage or injury to property or persons but excluding incidental and consequential damages, by any third party or any of the Indemnities arising out of, in connection with or resulting from (a) any breach of any representation or performance obligation of Distributor hereunder, or (b) any act or omission of Distributor, its employees, agents or representatives.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the Distributor shall indemnify STAAR for any kind of damages, including incidental and consequential damages. The modified text contradicts this by stating that the Distributor is responsible for any kind of damages but excluding incidental and consequential damages. This creates an inconsistency in the scope of indemnification.
